name: World War One: The Great War 1914-1918
name_original: World War One: The Great War 1914-1918
description:
World War One: The Great War 1914-1918 is a strategy game developed by Ageod. It was originally released in 2008. Ascaron Entertainment published the game.
World War One: The Great War 1914-1918 is available on PC.
